title: Repeals provision which provides that an insurer shall not be liable for loss sustained in consequence of the insured's being intoxicated or under the influence
summary: Repeals a provision which provides that an insurer shall not be liable for any loss sustained or contracted in consequence of the insured's being intoxicated or under the influence of any narcotic unless administered on the advice of the physician; this provision allowed insurers to deny payment for the medical treatment of such individuals.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1861

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. DINOWITZ, GOTTFRIED, BRENNAN, ORTIZ, GALEF, MILL-
         MAN -- read once and referred to the Committee on Insurance

       AN  ACT  to  repeal subparagraph (K) of paragraph 2 of subsection (d) of
         section 3216 of the insurance law

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subparagraph  (K)  of  paragraph  2  of subsection (d) of
    2  section 3216 of the insurance law is REPEALED.
    3    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
         REPEAL NOTE.--Subparagraph (K) of paragraph (2) of subsection  (d)  of
       section  3216  of  the insurance law, proposed to be repealed by section
       one of this act, provides that an insurer shall not be  liable  for  any
       loss  sustained  or  contracted  in  consequence  of the insured's being
       intoxicated or under the influence of any narcotic  unless  administered
       on the advice of the physician.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04380-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal subparagraph (K) of paragraph 2 of subsection (d) of section 3216 of the insurance law
